Title: Provides that the sentence for murder in the first degree shall be life imprisonment without parole; repealer
Summary: Provides that the sentence for murder in the first degree shall be life imprisonment without parole.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law and the criminal procedure law, in relation to imposing a mandatory sentence of life imprisonment without parole upon conviction of murder in the first degree; and to repeal sections 270.55 and 400.27 of the criminal procedure law relating to the procedure for determining the sentence for conviction of murder in the first degree
